titles: Directions propovnded and hvmbly presented to the high court of Parliament concerning the Booke of common prayer and episcopall government / written by a reverend and learned divine now resident in this city.
author: Udall, Ephraim, d. 1647.
Ussher, James, 1581-1656.
notes: Wing attributes work to Ephraim Udall, BM however, indicates possible attribution to "E Udall or Archbishop Usher."
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
keywords: Church of England. --  Book of common prayer.
